feed.title: MARINKA ZITNIK
feed.subtitle: Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Leveraging cell ontology to classify cell types

link.title: Leveraging cell ontology to classify cell types

entry.content: Hot off the press! We developed OnClass, an algorithm and accompanying software for automatically classifying cells into cell types that are part of the controlled vocabulary that forms the Cell Ontology.
entry.summary: Hot off the press! We developed OnClass, an algorithm and accompanying software for automatically classifying cells into cell types that are part of the controlled vocabulary that forms the Cell Ontology.

entry.title: Major New Release of TDC
entry.content: We are very excited to announce a major release of Therapeutics Data Commons! In the 0.3.0 release we restructured the codebase, simplified the backend and kept user interfaces the same. We also provide detailed documentation for our TDC package.
entry.summary: We are very excited to announce a major release of Therapeutics Data Commons! In the 0.3.0 release we restructured the codebase, simplified the backend and kept user interfaces the same. We also provide detailed documentation for our TDC package.

entry.title: Trustworthy AI for Healthcare at AAAI

link.title: Trustworthy AI for Healthcare at AAAI

entry.content: We will be organizing a meeting on Trustworthy AI for Healthcare at AAAI 2022. Stay tuned for details and call for papers.
entry.summary: We will be organizing a meeting on Trustworthy AI for Healthcare at AAAI 2022. Stay tuned for details and call for papers.

entry.title: New Paper on Therapeutics Data Commons

link.title: New Paper on Therapeutics Data Commons

entry.content: Our latest paper on Therapeutics Data Commons: Machine Learning Datasets and Tasks for Drug Discovery and Development will appear at NeurIPS. We are excited to contribute novel datasets and benchmarks in the broad area of therapeutics.
entry.summary: Our latest paper on Therapeutics Data Commons: Machine Learning Datasets and Tasks for Drug Discovery and Development will appear at NeurIPS. We are excited to contribute novel datasets and benchmarks in the broad area of therapeutics.

entry.title: AI for Science at NeurIPS
entry.content: We are organizing the AI for Science workshop at NeurIPS 2021 and have a stellar lineup of invited speakers.
entry.summary: We are organizing the AI for Science workshop at NeurIPS 2021 and have a stellar lineup of invited speakers.

entry.title: Best Poster Award at ICML Comp Biology

link.title: Best Poster Award at ICML Comp Biology

entry.content: Congratulations to Michelle for winning the Best Poster Award for her work on deep contextual learners for protein networks at the ICML Workshop on Computational Biology.
entry.summary: Congratulations to Michelle for winning the Best Poster Award for her work on deep contextual learners for protein networks at the ICML Workshop on Computational Biology.

entry.title: Best Paper Award at ICML Interpretable ML

link.title: Best Paper Award at ICML Interpretable ML

entry.content: Our short paper on Interactive Visual Explanations for Deep Drug Repurposing received the Best Paper Award at the ICML Interpretable ML in Healthcare Workshop. Stay tuned for more news on this evolving project.
entry.summary: Our short paper on Interactive Visual Explanations for Deep Drug Repurposing received the Best Paper Award at the ICML Interpretable ML in Healthcare Workshop. Stay tuned for more news on this evolving project.

entry.title: Five presentations at ICML 2021
entry.content: We are excited to be at ICML 2021 where we will present 1 paper at Workshop on Socially Responsible Machine Learning, 1 paper at Workshop on Theoretic Foundation, Criticism, and Application Trend of Explainable AI, 2 papers at Workshop on Interpretable Machine Learning in Healthcare, and 1 paper at Workshop on Computational Biology. Congratulations to fantastic students!
entry.summary: We are excited to be at ICML 2021 where we will present 1 paper at Workshop on Socially Responsible Machine Learning, 1 paper at Workshop on Theoretic Foundation, Criticism, and Application Trend of Explainable AI, 2 papers at Workshop on Interpretable Machine Learning in Healthcare, and 1 paper at Workshop on Computational Biology. Congratulations to fantastic students!

entry.title: Theory and Evaluation for Explanations
entry.content: We introduce the first axiomatic framework for theoretically analyzing, evaluating, and comparing GNN explanation methods. We formalize key properties that all methods should satisfy to generate reliable explanations: faithfulness, stability, and fairness.
entry.summary: We introduce the first axiomatic framework for theoretically analyzing, evaluating, and comparing GNN explanation methods. We formalize key properties that all methods should satisfy to generate reliable explanations: faithfulness, stability, and fairness.

entry.title: Deep Contextual Learners for Protein Networks

link.title: Deep Contextual Learners for Protein Networks

entry.content: New preprint on contextualized protein embeddings aims to characterize genes with disease-specific interactions and elucidate disease manifestation in specific cell types.
entry.summary: New preprint on contextualized protein embeddings aims to characterize genes with disease-specific interactions and elucidate disease manifestation in specific cell types.
